name: Inspect The Uninspected
description:
Our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2019!

A point and click adventure with one room, one action, and some fun jokes along the way.

Our goal was simply to make something together as friends;  so if you like it, hey that's pretty sweet!

Enjoy!

Organization LXIX is:

Tim Avery - Concept Design/ Animator/ Writer

Tyler Trulson - Programming / Writer

Sam Calow - Game Artist / Writer

Chris Ditmars - Musician/Sound Designer/Writer

Peter Cialli - Writer
